Posts.Content: Nervous_Nelly wrote: Hello all! Well 2 weeks ago I found a lump in my left breast... Went to the doctor which says it probably is nothing to worry about..However sent me for my ultrasound and mammogram today.. I am trying not to worry however I am just on the verge of freaking out..My husband of course says it could be anything don't worry..But I am very scared... first of all I have no Idea how long it has been there so on and so forth...Now I have to wait until Thursday for the report..And I am going to do nothing but worry until then... Anyway just wanted to say hello, and read other peoples thoughts and stories, maybe learn what to expect and so on.. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Newbie here..Worrying about this lump... Nervous_Nelly Sommer43
